allow: Bash(python -c "from main import app; print(''Import successful'')")
Bash(python -c "import os; open(''.env'', ''a'').close() if not os.path.exists(''.env'') else None")

Bash(GEMINI_API_KEY=test-key QDRANT_URL=http://localhost:6333 QDRANT_API_KEY=test-key DATABASE_URL=postgresql+asyncpg://postgres:password@localhost:5432/chatbot python -c "from app.core.config import AppConfig; config = AppConfig(); print(''Config loaded successfully'')")

Bash(timeout 10s cmd /c "cd backend && set GEMINI_API_KEY=test-key && set QDRANT_URL=http://localhost:6333 && set QDRANT_API_KEY=test-key && set DATABASE_URL=postgresql+asyncpg://postgres:password@localhost:5432/chatbot && python -c ""import uvicorn; from server import app; uvicorn.run(app, host=''0.0.0.0'', port=8000)"" 2>&1")
Bash(python -c "from server import app; print(''Server app loaded successfully''); print(''App title:'', app.title)")
